settings.label: Product background color
settings.info: Visible on product images with transparent background.
Used on Quick Shop and notification modals.

settings.label: Show cart after adding product
settings.info: This setting only works with 'Drawer' or 'Notification' cart type

settings.label: Show dynamic checkout button
settings.info: Lets customers check out directly using a familiar payment method. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/change-the-layout/dynamic-checkout)

settings.label: Low stock threshold
settings.info: The low stock notice displays if your inventory is equal to or lower than this number.

settings.label: Product description
settings.info: Display a custom description by using the 'quick_shop.description' meta-field. [Learn more](https://support.safeasmilk.co/article/249-venue-theme-settings-customize-your-quick-shop-product-description)

settings.content: These settings affect templates containing product cards such as the Collection page and various product sections.

settings.label: Show review stars
settings.info: To display a rating, add a product rating app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/product-reviews/installation)

settings.content: These settings also affect the thumbnail images found in the cart, search and recommended product areas.
Second image effect is disabled when using Quick Shop modal. All effects are disabled on touch devices.

settings.label: Use masonry layout
settings.info: For more information [click here](https://support.safeasmilk.co/article/36-product-grid-make-mixed-ratio-product-images-more-compatible).

settings.label: Hide other labels if sold out
New label period
settings.info: Number of days label is displayed after adding a product to your store.

settings.label: Variant trigger name(s)
settings.info: One entry per line. Can be used for both multiple variants and translations. [Learn more](https://support.safeasmilk.co/article/213-theme-settings-swatches)

settings.label: Custom swatch colors
settings.info: One entry per line. Names must exactly match variant names. [Learn more](https://support.safeasmilk.co/article/213-theme-settings-swatches)

settings.label: Custom swatch images
settings.info: One entry per line. Upload images via Settings > Files in the admin. Names must exactly match variant names. File names are case sensitive. [Learn more](https://support.safeasmilk.co/article/213-theme-settings-swatches)

settings.label: Button types
settings.info: 'View Cart' button will only be displayed inside the cart drawer

settings.label: Continue shopping link
settings.info: Link only displays on the cart page

settings.label: Recommendation type
settings.info: [Dynamic recommendations](https://help.shopify.com/en/themes/development/recommended-products) are automatic and improve over time. Complementary products are set up manually using the [Search and Discovery app](https://apps.shopify.com/search-and-discovery).

settings.label: Gift wrapping product
settings.info: Quantity tracking must be disabled for this product to display. [Learn more](https://support.safeasmilk.co/article/250-venue-theme-settings-set-up-a-gift-wrapping-product-in-the-cart)
Announce discount codes, free shipping, Black Friday deals etc. Displays on cart page and in cart drawer.

settings.label: Text
settings.default: Announce discount codes, free shipping etc

settings.label: SVG icon code
settings.info: Learn more about adding your own SVG icons [here](https://support.safeasmilk.co/article/236-general-add-custom-svg-icons-to-your-theme).

settings.label: Checkbox text
settings.default: I agree with the terms and conditions

settings.content: When a visitor views their empty cart, they will be prompted to click a button to continue shopping.
Learn more about setting unique purchase amounts for different markets [here](https://support.safeasmilk.co/article/243-venue-theme-settings-free-shipping-bar)

settings.label: SVG icon code
settings.info: Learn more about adding your own SVG icons [here](https://support.safeasmilk.co/article/236-general-add-custom-svg-icons-to-your-theme).

settings.content: Settings for predictive search and search results page can be adjusted in the [Search & Discovery app](https://apps.shopify.com/search-and-discovery)

settings.label: Enable 'Recent searches' list
settings.info: This list will only appear after the user has carried out some searches.

settings.label: Search drawer menu
settings.info: This menu won't show dropdown items. We recommend creating a link list of the most visited parts of your store.

settings.label: Search drawer products
settings.info: Display up to six products.

settings.content: Example: $100 USD. Codes will not be shown on line items and unit prices.
